long_description: Is your baby destined to play in the waves? Start him off right with the Patagonia Meridian Board Shorts. They feature soft and stretchy fabric along with an adjustable fit. Soft, stretch-woven polyester/spandex blend. Elastic waistband with internal button adjustment for comfort. Board short faux fly; angled right patch pocket with drain hole; side slits at hem for mobility. The Patagonia Meridian Board Shorts have a 4 in. inseam.
short_description: Is your baby destined to play in the waves? Start him off right with the Patagonia Meridian Board Shorts. They feature soft and stretchy fabric along with an adjustable fit.
